metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0085 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: JBoss Fuse did not enable encrypted passwords by default in its usage ofApache Zookeeper. This permitted sensitive information disclosure vialogging to local users. Note: this description has been updated; previoustext mistakenly identified the source of the flaw as Zookeeper. Previoustext: Apache Zookeeper logs cleartext admin passwords, which allows localusers to obtain sensitive information by reading the log.

criterions.comment: zookeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
